title: 2021 Week 3 Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Week 3 Preview
description:
A ROOM filled with a couple heroes - Dan Hanzus and Gregg Rosenthal preview each and every upcoming game of Week 3, starting with the primetime games and followed by a two-person draft of the rest of the slate. Everyone, including Ricky Hollywood and the Wesseling Brothers, make their pick for lock of the week.

Around the NFL is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
